name: CÖIN
description:
An example LÖVE game, created for a workshop.

Source available at https://bitbucket.org/gprosser/coin

Assets used:

  1. http://freesound.org/people/Ali_6868/sounds/384877/
  2. http://freesound.org/people/pierrecartoons1979/sounds/90121/
  3. http://freesound.org/people/joshuaempyre/sounds/251461/
  4. https://www.dafont.com/gamer-2.font
  5. https://kenney.nl/assets/sokoban
